reviewText: Exact instructions, shown many different ways. I could almost get up and dance the steps after watching. Excellent Dance Instruction Video. Why don't people dance like this anymore?
This was a gift and the recipient thought it was great.

Four dances are thoroughly taught. Each dance can be watched all the way through or can be broken down into each step. One can start with the detailed version of a dance, but won't be required to sit through the details once they are attained. The website for Stately Steps has lots of info too.
